gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Request>

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Request>
    Users employ this object for accessing the data and operating on them. In fact it creates a request for operating on the intended data and sends it to the data center which is located in the same region as itself.

        dataitemID - request is sent for accessing this data item
        time - time of submit request
        sessionId - each request is identified by a sessionID
